header.title: Additional support services
header.subtitle: Beyond visa advice, we help you with education, housing, banking and everyday questions so that your move feels calm and organised.

education.title: Education support
education.body: We help families and students choose the right schools, universities or training programmes in South Africa.

points.0: Guidance on schools, language courses and universities
points.1: Recommendations based on your goals, language and budget
points.2: Support with applications and required documents

realEstate.title: Real estate & relocation
realEstate.body: We assist with understanding neighbourhoods, housing options and practical aspects of settling in.

points.0: High-level insights into areas and lifestyle differences
points.1: Support in exploring rental or purchase options via trusted partners

banking.title: Banking & everyday administration
banking.body: We help you navigate basic administrative tasks so you can focus on your new life, not just paperwork.

points.0: Guidance on opening local bank accounts and using online banking
points.1: Information support for administrative questions and local procedures

summary.title: How we support your move
summary.body: Our role is not only to help you get a visa, but to make sure you understand what life in South Africa can look like and feel supported while you adapt.
